query:
SELECT p.id, p.lojaId, l.nome as lojaNome, p.descricao, p.resolvido
FROM pendentes p
INNER JOIN lojas l ON p.lojaId = l.id
WHERE p.lojaId IN (
  SELECT gl.lojaId FROM gestor_lojas gl 
  INNER JOIN gestores g ON gl.gestorId = g.id
  INNER JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id
  WHERE u.name LIKE '%Fábio%' OR u.name LIKE '%Fabio%'
)
LIMIT 10;

FROM pendentes p
INNER JOIN lojas l ON p.lojaId = l.id
WHERE p.lojaId IN (
  SELECT gl.lojaId FROM gestor_lojas gl 
  INNER JOIN gestores g ON gl.gestorId = g.id
  INNER JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id
  WHERE u.name LIKE '%Fábio%' OR u.name LIKE '%Fabio%'
